page.title: 05PLAYING IN CRACKLEY WOODS
page.content: Crackley Wood is a great place to play in. You can imagine yourself lost in an alien world, or being an outlaw, or being attacked by wild beasts. There are many enormous trees to climb, the best ones being the biggest because you get an excellent view of everything around you including the farms. There is a squash and tennis club next to the woods. The dissused railway is great fun for ambushing people on because there are well hidden slopes on either side making it almost impossible to be spotted. The woods are a safe place, because it hasn't got a reputation for child abductors or malestors. I think it is a superb place to play in.
